      • getInfo

        public static RasterUtilities.RasterInfo getInfo(java.io.File file)
                                          throws IllegalActionException
        Get a RasterInfo object for a raster file. This method calls "gdalinfo" to find the CRS and bounding box.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException
